snippet: Diego Ulissi of Italy won a tough eighth stage as the Giro d’Italia took to the mountains, and Cadel Evans finished fifth to take the overall lead from Michael Matthews.
abstract: Diego Ulissi of Italy wins a tough eighth stage as the Giro d’Italia takes to the mountains, and Cadel Evans finishes fifth to take the overall lead from Michael Matthews.
lead_paragraph: Diego Ulissi of Italy won a tough eighth stage as the Giro d’Italia took to the mountains, and Cadel Evans finished fifth to take the overall lead from Michael Matthews.

headline.main: Ulissi Wins Stage and Evans Takes Lead at Giro d’Italia
